hgraph.title: Hectiq Graph
hgraph.subtitle: A cloud platform designed for e-commerce
hgraph.description: Hectiq Graph offers graph-based solutions to e-commerce platforms. It analyzes your products visual and contextual information, and users behaviors in order to perform personalized requests.
hgraph.info-subtitle: Leave us your email and we will be in touch shortly.

hectiq-deploy.title: Hectiq Deploy
hectiq-deploy.subtitle: Frictionless deployments and serving of machine learning models
hectiq-deploy.description: Hectiq Deploy is an exclusive tool to deploy and serve models in the cloud. It lets you manage the model versions, the training, and the inference tasks.
hectiq-deploy.item3: Periodic and overnight trainings and inferences
hectiq-deploy.info-subtitle: Leave us your email and we will be in touch shortly.

what-we-do.title: What we do
what-we-do.subtitle: We have many years of experience building & deploying machine learning models & data infrastructures in the real world.
what-we-do.ml-description: Designing, validating, and implementing custom-fit deep learning models using state-of-the-art methods.
what-we-do.data-description: Developing statistical & predictive models using robust and well-established methods.
what-we-do.engi-description: Setting up an efficient and scalable analytics backend, data processing pipelines and data warehouses.
what-we-do.frontend-description: Building and designing frontend softwares & analytics dashboards for AI-based and data driven products.

process.title: An end-to-end process
process.description: We work closely with our clients & assist them to make sure they can use & maintain AI tech in the future. We don’t only ship code, we help companies make the AI transition in order to evolve and grow, in the near and distant future.
process.description2: Did you know that the most common source of AI project failure happens at the deployment or integration? At Hectiq AI, we believe in shipping a fully working solution.
process.research-description: Explore to find the best solution

clients.title: Some of our clients and partners

leadership.title: Our Team
leadership.martin-laprise-description: Until 2010, Martin was doing research in nonlinear optics as a PhD Candidate in Physics at Université Laval. After his graduate study, he worked as a Data Scientist for multiple companies where he led the data science and machine learning effort. Martin has over 10 years of experience at applying machine learning & data science to real world problem in companies.
leadership.edward-laurence-description: During his PhD in physics, Edward has developed a strong expertise in structured data, especially in community detection and dimension reduction. Following the rise of deep learning, he became proficient in machine learning for tasks such as graphs data analysis, image and time series classification. He then polished his knowledge by landing at Hectiq.ai where he solves concrete problems by using newly developed methods or applying state of the art approaches.
leadership.albert-dang-vu-description: At Hectiq.AI, Albert manages business strategy and partnerships. Albert is also Co-President and CEO of Mirego, a service company that builds high-end digital products and solutions for businesses. Before founding Mirego in 2007, he was the Vice President of Copernic Technologies, a technology company listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange. In 2015, Albert received the Ernst & Young’s provincial Information Technology Entrepreneur of the Year award.
leadership.denis-laprise-description: Denis is an entrepreneur fascinated by the boundaries between the physical world and technology. He co-founded Poly9, a mapping consultancy, and sold it to Apple in 2010. At Apple he led a group working on map rendering. Denis then co-founded Curbside, a company building a platform to enable online local commerce, which got acquired by Rakuten in 2018 and where he’s currently serving as CTO.
